title: Callahan
description: Callahan Book 7 of the MC series brings us to our gentle giant Tiny.With Nancy determined to get her way Tiny finds himself in the middle of his worst nightmare. Dr. Phil and Oprah have him worried that kids will tear his little family apart and they're right. Nancy has had enough. Tiny is great with kids and she wants more. With the help of the Brothers and Jeremy, Nancy finally gets her wish. Just when they are settling into their new lives a street-smart kid does the unthinkable throwing the house and family into turmoil.An abused mute boy, kids being bullied and Tiny's secret have the MC stretched to the limit. The Brothers step in to the fight to eliminate child sex trafficking while showing Tiny and Nancy how far 'we take care of our own' goes, but will it be enough to save their marriage?
author: L. Ann Marie
